verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, you <S%H1121>sons<s%>, the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of a <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H7181>attend<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
For I <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3948>teaching<s%>, <S%H5800>forsake<s%> you not my <S%H8451>law<s%>.
For I was my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H3173>only<s%> beloved in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>.

He <S%H3384>taught<s%> me <S%H559>also<s%>, and said unto <S%H3820>me<s%>, Let your heart <S%H8551>retain<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>: <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>.
<S%H7069>Get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%>: <S%H7911>forget<s%> it <S%H5186>not<s%>; neither decline from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> her <S%H8104>not<s%>, and she shall preserve <S%H157>you<s%>: love <S%H5341>her<s%>, and she shall keep you.
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is the principal <S%H7225>thing<s%>; therefore <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: and with all your <S%H7075>getting<s%> get <S%H998>understanding<s%>.
<S%H5549>Exalt<s%> <S%H7311>her<s%>, and she shall promote <S%H3513>you<s%>: she shall bring you to honor, when you do embrace <S%H2263>her<s%>.
She shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H7218>head<s%> a <S%H3880>ornament<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%>: a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory<s%> shall she deliver to <S%H4042>you<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>sayings<s%>; and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H7235>many<s%>.
I have <S%H3384>taught<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; I have <S%H1869>led<s%> you in <S%H3476>right<s%> <S%H4570>paths<s%>.
When you <S%H3212>go<s%>, your <S%H6806>steps<s%> shall not be <S%H3334>hampered<s%>; and when you <S%H7323>run<s%>, you shall not <S%H3782>stumble<s%>.
Take fast <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%>; let her not <S%H7503>go<s%>: <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H2416>her<s%>; for she is your life.
<S%H935>Enter<s%> not into the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, and <S%H833>go<s%> not in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men<s%>.
<S%H6544>Avoid<s%> <S%H5674>it<s%>, walk not by <S%H7847>it<s%>, turn from <S%H5674>it<s%>, and pass away.
For they <S%H3462>sleep<s%> <S%H7489>not<s%>, except they have done mischief; and their <S%H8142>sleep<s%> is taken <S%H1497>away<s%>, unless they cause some to <S%H3782>fall<s%>.
For they <S%H3898>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
But the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is as the <S%H5051>shining<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, that <S%H215>shines<s%> <S%H1980>more<s%> and more unto the <S%H3559>perfect<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is as <S%H653>darkness<s%>: they <S%H3045>know<s%> not at what they <S%H3782>stumble<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%>; <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> unto my <S%H561>sayings<s%>.
Let them not <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; <S%H8104>keep<s%> them in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>.
For they are <S%H2416>life<s%> unto those that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4832>them<s%>, and health to all their <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> with all <S%H4929>diligence<s%>; for out of it are the <S%H8444>issues<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.
Put <S%H5493>away<s%> from you a <S%H6143>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H3891>perverse<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> put far from <S%H7368>you<s%>.
Let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> right <S%H5227>on<s%>, and let your <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> look straight before <S%H3474>you<s%>.
<S%H6424>Ponder<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and let all your <S%H1870>ways<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%>.
<S%H5186>Turn<s%> not to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>: <S%H5493>remove<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
